BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education and the Committee on Higher Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Title IX - Gender Discrimination
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education and the Committee on Higher Education
Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to maintain at least seven Title IX Coordinator positions, with at least one coordinator at each borough field support center.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to maintain at least seven Title IX Coordinator positions, with at least one coordinator at each borough field support center.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on efforts to prevent and address sex- and gender-based discrimination and harassment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting on efforts to prevent and address sex- and gender-based discrimination and harassment.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the  New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation to require inclusion of Employee Protection Provisions (EPPs) in all current and future school bus contracts in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require inclusion of Employee Protection Provisions (EPPs) in all current and future school bus contracts in NYC.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  King, Cornegy, Treyger, Menchaca, Grodenchik, Dromm, Ampry-Samuel, Barron, Eugene, Maisel, Salamanca, Levine and Rose.

Items.Title: Oversight - Title IX - Gender Discrimination
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on efforts to prevent and address sex- and gender-based discrimination and harassment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting on efforts to prevent and address sex- and gender-based discrimination and harassment.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to maintain at least seven Title IX Coordinator positions, with at least one coordinator at each borough field support center.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the  New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation to require inclusion of Employee Protection Provisions (EPPs) in all current and future school bus contracts in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require inclusion of Employee Protection Provisions (EPPs) in all current and future school bus contracts in NYC.
